info.description: These are the endpoints related to email templates used in your campaigns. You can list all your templates as well as ask for a specific one to be able to examine the details and determine the required adjustments.
info.title: SAP Emarsys Core - Email templates

host.description: This is the Emarsys API server.

externalDocs.description: For more information, please visit our official SAP Emarsys developer portal.

get.description:
Returns a list of all templates, including their names and identifiers.

**Note:** This endpoint is not compatible with VC (block-based) email templates.

schema.description: See the example or [Response Codes](https://dev.emarsys.com/docs/core-api-reference/cnyqzhdnbl7r2-http-200-errors) for details.

parameters.name: templates
parameters.description: The name of the required template.

get.description:
Returns the data of an email template.

**Note**: This endpoint is not compatible with VCE (block-based) e-mail templates.

id.description: The identifier of the group containing sections.

name.description: The name of the group containing sections.

x-sap-shortText: These endpoints allow you to search and examine your email templates used in your campaigns in order to determine required modifications.

oauth2ClientCredentials.description: To use this API, you must first obtain an OAuth 2.0 client credentials token. After that you can use the token to call the API. For more information, see [Authentication](https://dev.emarsys.com/docs/emarsys-core-api-guides/branches/OAuth-2.0/b3c3a1eba8515-authentication-in-v3-api).

replyCode.description: The Emarsys response code. Successful requests return 0; otherwise, see [errors](https://dev.emarsys.com/docs/core-api-reference/jir98la21pufy-http-400-errors).

replyText.description: Additional information on the status of the request.

data.description: Contains the requested data, if applicable.

default-error-response.description: This is the generic SAP Emarsys error message.
